title: Clubs
description: Top-level club list, sorted by name A-Z

name.description: Club name. Parsed as HTML, so elements like <i> can be used, but characters like & need to be escaped (e.g. &)

id.description: Club ID (abbreviation if more common but usually full name, no "club", a-z, 0-9, -)

logo.description: Logo file extension. The actual file is stored in /resources/images/clubs/{{ club["id"] }}/logo.{{ club["logo"] }}

teams-code.description: Code of club team on Microsoft Teams

meeting-days.description: Array of meeting days, if club uses fixed-day meetings. Leave blank only if club does not use day-of-week meetings (e.g. Science Club), not for TBA/unknown

meeting-room.description: Club's full meeting room, including last letter

desc.description:
Club description. Should be written by someone from the club. Parsed as HTML, so paragraphs can be started using

(no closing needed), , etc., but characters like & need to be escaped (e.g. &)
examples:
The Computer Programming Club is for anyone interested in programming, web design [...] etc.

Join today!
